name: PKCE Always with Spring Boot, OIDC & Okta
description: This app demonstrates integrating a simple Spring Boot / Spring Security app with Okta using OIDC. An Okta org is provisioned. Look at the app environment variables for login info.

OKTA_OAUTH2_PKCE_ALWAYS.description: Should PKCE be used with the app?

LOGGING_LEVEL_ORG_SPRINGFRAMEWORK_WEB_CL.description: set DEBUG for RestTemplate logging to see PKCE in action
